version_description:
* Google Images now works again
* Picasa service had to be removed because Google has shut it down for API search

* Fixed crash with some newer devices when trying to browse through Downloaded photos
================ Includes Earlier fixes
* Google Images now works again
* Picasa service had to be removed because Google has shut it down for API search
* Fixed a bug where the action menu would not display when used on iOS 10+, on iPad.

Fixed: Bing and dependent services stopped working
Stability improvements in search terms and downloaded file management

* Fixed status bar not hiding properly in full photo view
* Fixed single tap on photo in full photo view would bring back navigation only after second tap on some devices
* Added advertising to enable us to keep the app free to use for everyone
Performance and stability improvements.

* Fixed Google Images not working
* Removed Photobucket source because they're now sending invalid urls for thumbnails.
Fixed compatibility issues that started with iOS 11, including the landscape rotation issue of full screen photos.

* Fixed compatibility issues that started with iOS 11, including the landscape rotation issue of full screen photos
* Fixed problems with saving photos to Camera Roll

* Fixed compatibility issues that started with iOS 11, including the landscape rotation issue of full screen photos
* Fixed problems with saving photos to Camera Roll (now with iOS 10.x as well)
Performance and stability improvements

Performance and stability improvements.
Going forward, only iOS 6+ can be supported for picTrove 1.

* Fixed crash with browsing downloaded images.
* Performance and stability improvements.
* Going forward, only iOS 6+ can be supported for picTrove 1.

NEW full photo viewer screen with:
* Animated GIF support
* Dedicated Save buttons

Improvements
=============
* Fixed crash with browsing downloaded images.
* Performance and stability improvements.
* Going forward, only iOS 6+ can be supported for picTrove 1.

NEW full photo viewer screen with:
* Animated GIF support
* Dedicated Save buttons

Improvements
=============
* Fixed crash with Share image button's -> Save Image
* Fixed crash when pressing Share image on devices running older than iOS 8
* Fixed crashes with browsing downloaded images.
* Performance and stability improvements.
* Going forward, only iOS 6+ can be supported for picTrove 1.

NEW full photo viewer screen with:
* Animated GIF support
* Dedicated Save buttons

Improvements
=============
* Fixed crash that would sometimes happen in slideshow mode
* Fixed crash that would sometimes happen when navigating to a photo from thumbnails
* Fixed crash with Share image button's -> Save Image
* Fixed crash when pressing Share image on devices running older than iOS 8
* Fixed crashes with browsing downloaded images.
* Performance and stability improvements.
* Going forward, only iOS 6+ can be supported for picTrove 1.

NEW full photo viewer screen with:
* Animated GIF support
* Dedicated Save buttons

Improvements
=============
* Tapping on search results now goes directly to full view
* Saving an image to Photos library now adds it to a picTrove album (iOS 8+ only)
* Confirmation message of saving an image to Photos library is now shown
* Flickr Just Uploaded and Interesting Photos work again
* Fixed crashes for iOS 6 devices
* Fixed crash that would sometimes happen in slideshow mode
* Fixed crash that would sometimes happen when navigating to a photo from thumbnails
* Fixed crash with Share image button's -> Save Image
* Fixed crash when pressing Share image on devices running older than iOS 8
* Fixed crashes with browsing downloaded images.
* Performance and stability improvements.
* Going forward, only iOS 6+ can be supported for picTrove 1.

NEW full photo viewer screen with:
* Animated GIF support
* Dedicated Save buttons

Improvements
=============
* Smoother transition on slideshow
* Tapping on search results now goes directly to full view
* Saving an image to Photos library now adds it to a picTrove album (iOS 8+ only)
* Confirmation message of saving an image to Photos library is now shown
* Flickr Just Uploaded and Interesting Photos work again
* Fixed crash for directly saving to Photos library album
* Fixed crashes for iOS 6 devices
* Fixed crash that would sometimes happen in slideshow mode
* Fixed crash that would sometimes happen when navigating to a photo from thumbnails
* Fixed crash with Share image button's -> Save Image
* Fixed crash when pressing Share image on devices running older than iOS 8
* Fixed crashes with browsing downloaded images.
* Performance and stability improvements.
* Going forward, only iOS 6+ can be supported for picTrove 1.
Improved results from Google Images
* GIFs found via Bing Images now save reliably to both device Photos library as well as to Downloaded Images within picTrove.

NEW full photo viewer screen with:
* Animated GIF support
* Dedicated Save buttons

Improvements
=============
* Fixed problem where after pinch zooming a photo, it wasn't possible to scroll the zoomed photo
* Photo prefetching improvements
* Fixed problem where duplicate filenames were unable to be saved in picTrove Downloads
* Improvements to thumbnail display in picTrove Downloads folder
